name: PeppL: Free Job Search in Hotels/Restaurants
description: Every industry has its own nuances and recruitment challenges that cannot be solved effectively by generic solutions available to all sectors. PeppL therefore takes a focussed approach: we connect the F&B industry.   Making it easier & relevant for job seekers - You will see all jobs posted by hotels/restaurants that match your experience, skills, preferences or salary. Not a single irrelevant job to waste your time! - No false promises or charges to show you job opportunities. - Our ingenious algorithms do not require you to type anything. We do not even require a resume to show you job opportunities that will be 100% relevant to your experience! - Are you uncomfortable with English? To is mein kya hai: Hinglish mein padh lijiye! - To top it all, you will get notified on WhatsApp every time you are shortlisted by a hotel/restaurant of your choice   Hop on board & join the journey to connect the F&B industry!
